kidFriendly.description: Every activity in your itinerary is vetted for families. Parks, museums with interactive exhibits, amusement parks, and experiences kids actually enjoy.

ageAppropriate.title: Age-Appropriate Suggestions
ageAppropriate.description: Traveling with toddlers is different from traveling with teens. Our AI tailors activities to your children's ages so everyone stays engaged.

familyBudget.title: Family Budget Management
familyBudget.description: Family trips add up fast. Get itineraries across three budget tiers — Budget, Balanced, and Premium — with transparent per-person costs including kids' pricing.

safeDestinations.title: Safe, Tested Destinations
safeDestinations.description: Every recommended venue is verified for family safety. We prioritize well-reviewed, family-welcoming locations with good accessibility.

familySchedule.title: Balanced Family Schedules
familySchedule.description: No more over-packed days that lead to meltdowns. Our AI builds in rest breaks, nap times, and a mix of active and relaxed activities.

familyDining.title: Kid-Friendly Restaurants
familyDining.description: Find restaurants with children's menus, high chairs, and family-welcoming atmospheres. No more scrambling for somewhere the kids will eat.

howItWorks.title: Plan a Family Trip in 3 Simple Steps

step1.title: Enter Family Details
step1.description: Tell us your destination, travel dates, children's ages, and what your family enjoys. Beach lovers? History buffs? Theme park fans? We've got you.

step2.title: AI Builds Your Family Itinerary
step2.description: Our AI generates a complete day-by-day plan with kid-friendly activities, family restaurants, and realistic scheduling — all in under 60 seconds.

step3.title: Enjoy Your Trip Together
step3.description: Swap activities, adjust timing for nap schedules, and share the plan with your partner. Less planning stress, more family fun.

whatAges.question: What ages does the family trip planner support?
whatAges.answer: MonkeyTravel supports families with children of all ages — from infants and toddlers to teenagers. Just enter each child's age and our AI will tailor activities accordingly, from stroller-friendly walks to adventure activities for teens.

isFree.question: Is the family trip planner free?
isFree.answer: Yes, MonkeyTravel is completely free for families. Create unlimited family itineraries, share plans with your partner, and plan across multiple budget tiers — all without paying anything or entering a credit card.

howSafe.question: How do you ensure activities are safe for kids?
howSafe.answer: Every venue in our database includes family-friendliness ratings based on real reviews. We prioritize well-established, highly-rated locations and flag any venues that may not be suitable for young children.

specialNeeds.question: Can I plan for children with dietary needs or allergies?
specialNeeds.answer: Yes. You can specify dietary requirements and the AI will prioritize restaurants that accommodate allergies and special diets. We recommend confirming directly with restaurants before your visit for the most up-to-date information.

multiFamily.question: Can I plan a trip with multiple families?
multiFamily.answer: Absolutely. MonkeyTravel includes group collaboration tools — invite other families via link, vote on activities together, and build a shared itinerary that works for everyone.

destinations.question: What family-friendly destinations do you support?
destinations.answer: MonkeyTravel generates family itineraries for any city worldwide. We have enriched data for 20+ popular family destinations including Orlando, Barcelona, Tokyo, London, and Rome, with more being added regularly.
